16 SignalDetector::SignalDetector(SmaccScheduler* scheduler)
17 {
18  scheduler_ = scheduler;
19  loop_rate_hz = 10.0;

27 void SignalDetector::registerActionClientRequest(ISmaccActionClient* actionClientRequestInfo)
28 {
29  ROS_INFO("Signal detector is aware of the '-- %s -- action client request'", actionClientRequestInfo->getName().c_str());
30  openRequests_.push_back(actionClientRequestInfo);
31  ROS_INFO("Added to the opened requests list");
32 }

41  smaccStateMachine_ = stateMachine;

50 {
51  processorHandle_ = processorHandle;

59 void SignalDetector::runThread()
60 {
61  signalDetectorThread_ = boost::thread( boost::bind(&SignalDetector::pollingLoop, this ));
62 }
63 
69 void SignalDetector::join()
70 {
71  signalDetectorThread_.join();
72 }

79 void SignalDetector::notifyFeedback(ISmaccActionClient* client)
80 {
81  //ROS_INFO("Notify feedback");
82  //boost::intrusive_ptr< EvActionFeedback > actionFeedbackEvent = new EvActionFeedback();
83  //actionFeedbackEvent->client = client;
84 
85  client->postFeedbackEvent(scheduler_, processorHandle_);
86 
87  //ROS_INFO("Sending feedback event");
88  //scheduler_->queue_event(processorHandle_, actionFeedbackEvent);
89 }

96 void SignalDetector::finalizeRequest(ISmaccActionClient* client)
97 {
98  ROS_INFO("SignalDetector: Finalizing actionlib request: %s. RESULT: %s", client->getName().c_str(), client->getState().toString().c_str());
99  auto it = find(openRequests_.begin(),openRequests_.end(),client);
100 
101  if (it != openRequests_.end())
102  {
103  openRequests_.erase(it);
104  }
105 
106  //boost::intrusive_ptr< IActionResult> actionClientResultEvent = client->createActionResultEvent();
107  //actionClientResultEvent->client = client;
108 
109  ROS_INFO("SignalDetector: Sending successEvent");
110  client->postEvent(scheduler_, processorHandle_);
111  // SmaccScheduler
112  //SmaccScheduler::processor_handle
113  //scheduler_->queue_event(processorHandle_, actionClientResultEvent);
114 }
115 
121 void SignalDetector::toString(std::stringstream& ss)
122 {
123  ss << "--------" << std::endl;
124  ss << "Open requests" << std::endl;
125  for(ISmaccActionClient* smaccActionClient: this->openRequests_)
126  {
127  auto state = smaccActionClient->getState().toString();
128  ss << smaccActionClient->getName() << ": " << state << std::endl;
129  }
130  ss << "--------";
131 }
132 
138 void SignalDetector::pollOnce()
139 {
140  for(ISmaccActionClient* smaccActionClient: openRequests_)
141  {
142  // check feedback messages
143  if (smaccActionClient->hasFeedback())
144  {
145  notifyFeedback(smaccActionClient);
146  }
147 
148  // check result
149  auto state = smaccActionClient->getState();
150  if(state.isDone())
151  {
152  finalizeRequest(smaccActionClient);
153  }
154  }
155 }
156 
162 void SignalDetector::pollingLoop()
163 {
164  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
165 
166  if(!nh.param("signal_detector_loop_freq",this->loop_rate_hz))
167  {
168  }
169 
170  nh.setParam("signal_detector_loop_freq",this->loop_rate_hz);
171 
172  ros::Rate r(loop_rate_hz);
173 
174  ROS_INFO_STREAM("[SignalDetector] loop rate hz:" << loop_rate_hz);
175  while (ros::ok())
176  {
177  pollOnce();
178  ros::spinOnce();
179  r.sleep();
180  }
181 }
182 }
